p: After extrinsic incubation and cold-anesthesia, wings and legs of each mosquito were removed and the proboscis was inserted into a 10 µl capillary tube containing 8 µl of DMEM with10% FBS for 45 min. The mixture of DMEM-FBS and saliva was expelled into 100 µl of DMEM medium and stored at −80°C until further processing.
